text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Valorant. The build quality of the Acer Predator Triton 500 PT515-51-71VV 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Acer Predator Triton 500 PT515-51-71VV 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the screen brightness is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA RTX 2060 in the Acer Predator Triton 500 PT515-51-71VV 15.6" 144 Hz IPS Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 16 GB Memory 512 GB SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
